nano.remexp.broadcaster

Packages that use nano.remexp.broadcaster

Classes in nano.remexp.broadcaster used by nano.remexp.broadcaster
FilteringPool
          The pool of clients that need to be dealt with.
RemoteExperimentBroadcaster
          This is the main class to be started.
RemoteExperimentMonitor
          This class is a monitor state of the remote experiment.
Sample
          This class reflects the samples that can be approached by the remote experiment.
StreamPipe
          The StreamPipe is the stream broadcaster of the stream data input from the remote experiment to the client sockets that receive the stream data.
